page.title: 09Old People In Chatteris
page.content: Out of a total population of 6180, 1515 are aged 60 and over. Of these 655 are males, 860 are females. {Lyons Court}is warden controlled accomodation consisting of flats and bungalows. It is run by{Fenland {District Council.}There are 38 people here at present, 17 of whom were originally here when the home opened in 1972. There are 13 males and 28 females in the age range 68 to 90. They go into the flats/bungalows because they are smaller and easier to look after, not because of ill health. There is a long waiting list. Facilities include a laundry room with a drier; communal kitchen, lounge/reading room, guestroom and pay telephones. The{warden}has her own accomodation within the home. Outside are areas of grass and flowers. Residents help maintain the grounds.
